sentences.sContent: One morning, I didn't want to go to school, and decided to feign illness.
sentences.sCn: 一天早上，我不愿去上学，就决定装病。

remMethod.val: 他精心设计 (design) 了这次伪造 (feign) 行动

trans.tranCn: 装作， 假装； 伪造， 捏造， 杜撰
trans.tranOther: If someone feigns a particular feeling, attitude, or physical condition, they try to make other people think that they have it or are experiencing it, although this is not true
